systems Work Experience Network Administrator City of Odessa March 2015 to Present Domain admin and network support for the city of Odessa Upgraded the wireless backhauls of over 23 sites and the wireless infrastructure for the entire city network Installed and maintained servers virtual through Veam and bare metal Configured installed and monitored switches routers firewalls and controllers Installed maintained and repaired our VOIP analog and digital phone systems for the entire city Provided estimates and lead projects for network installs ups generators data center upgrades and installations of all of the above District Field Engineer National Oilwell Varco August 2005 to April 2008 I was responsible for the installation configuration operation and maintenance of office and rig networks in Texas I installed troubleshot all new test equipment from performance drilling systems to electronic survey equipment I installed calibrated troubleshot and repaired monitoring systems for fluid levels pressure RPM gas readings weight depth EDRPVT I built custom channels and wrote algorithms for our software to do realtime calculations on PLCs and our servers I installed and repaired manual and selfaligning satellite dishes for communications I also did a large amount of training to large classes while with NOV I trained technicians and customers on all of NOVs systems Network Systems Specialist US Marines August 2000 to August 2004 Tactical network specialists are responsible for installation configuration operation and maintenance of networking systems This includes installing and configuring hubs routers bridges and various transmission media installing and configuring server hardware and software and coordinating with the information systems specialist to ensure the proper installation and configuration of workstation hardware and software to ensure efficient operation on the network Tactical network specialists also install optimize and troubleshoot Local Area and Wide Area Networks and operate the Tactical Data Network TDN server Education Associate in General Studies Community College of Baltimore County Baltimore MD May 2011 to May 2013 Skills Active Directory Networking Technical Support Windows Vmware Customer Service Windows 7 Sales
